title: Analyze Philip II's leadership of Spain

content.question: Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 30 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your essay. In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. If time permits when you finish writing, check your work. “Leadership determines the fate of a country." Evaluate this quotation in terms of Spain’s experience under Philip II.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
